title: October 5, 2013 in front of CdA Public Library which I had been tossed out of. I had told the Library...

attachments.displayName:
October 5, 2013 in front of CdA Public Library which I had been tossed out of. I had told the Library staffer the week before that I planned on coming to have my photo taken with "Darth Vader". When I showed up, the person dressed as Darth Vader had already changed out of the costume.

To me, DICK Cheney is Darth Vader, since the results of the 1970's Idaho Congressman Frank Church initiated Special Congressional Investigation of Senator DICK Cheney's Involvement in the CIA's Mind Control Enslavement Program has not YET been released to the General Public=Taxpayers that paid for the 1970's Special Congressional Investigation.

I have taken the Oath to Defend the Constitution of the United States of America and to protect Americans from enemies both foreign and DOMESTIC 3 times when I first entered the US Army in January 1974; when I reenlisted in September 1976 and when I joined the WAARNG in March 1995 while homeless in Dom 6 geographically located at American Lake VAMC in Lakewood, WA.

I prepared the location where I wanted my friend to take my photo in the library; on the stage where the CdA City Council meets. I placed the American Flag near the CdA Decal on the wall and then went to apply my 5 color facepaint, that took 7 years to come up with the colors and I 'knew' to place on my face as a prayer when I got 'goosebumps' while reading the Rainbow Horse vision of Black Elk.

The Library person had moved the flag back into the corner, I moved it back, he attempted to place it back into the corner. I told him about my swearing the Oath 3 times, he grabbed my arm and dragged me out of the library, while I protested speaking VERY LOUDLY!!!!  I then had to go back into the library because my car keys were left on the stage while I was being given the Bum's Rush by a City Employee!

He, evidently, called 911 to report me.  The CdA Police Officer said, "I always love hearing everything you have to say!" and then chuckled with Admiration.

In 2005, I sent twisted tobacco to Pine Ridge Indian Reservation to Floyd Looks for Buffalo Hand to give to his cousin, Alexander White Plume, http://grangehemppolicy.info Alex was then Tribal Chairman of the Oglala Nation in a 6 yr Court Battle with D.E.A. for "The New Billion Dollar Crop" "The Great Book of Hemp" I wanted him to give the twisted tobacco to a Lakota Medicine Man so he could offer it to both the Female and Male (Industrial Hemp) Cannibus plant, then listen to the spirit of the plants in the Sacred Sweat Lodge.  He could have then testified in court=Separation between Church and State,,, SO it got mailed back to me....

object.content:

He, evidently, called 911 to report me.  The CdA Police Officer said, "I always love hearing everything you have to say!" and then chuckled with Admiration.
